about.title: About Me
about.description:
üöÄ Full Stack Developer with an Educator's Heart

I blend my experience as an English teacher with my passion for web development to create digital solutions that don't just work - they communicate.

‚ú® My Unique Edge: 
I translate technical complexity into clarity. My background in education enables me to communicate complex ideas precisely, lead diverse teams, and deeply understand end-user needs.

üîç My Philosophy:
Clean code. Intuitive interfaces. Solutions that solve real-world problems.

üå± Currently exploring new technologies and seeking challenging projects where my unique skill combination can make a meaningful impact.

Looking for a developer who combines technical excellence with great communication skills? Let's talk!

countriesExplorer.description: A modern web application that allows users to explore information about different countries. Built with React and TypeScript, featuring dynamic filtering, search functionality, and detailed country information.

ecommerce.description: My first website, built using only HTML5 and CSS3. This was my initial attempt at implementing CSS Grid while applying fundamental web development principles.

realEstate.description: A real estate platform showcasing properties with detailed information. At the time, I had no knowledge of media queries or responsive design.

coffeeBlog.description: An informative blog about coffee culture and brewing techniques.
